_metadata.description: Subprocessor disclosure questionnaire. Sent to all Critical and High vendors.

questionnaire.instructions: Please provide information about all third-party entities (subprocessors, subservice organizations, hosting providers, infrastructure partners) that handle, store, process, or transit data belonging to our organization.

questions.question: List all subprocessors who handle, store, process, or transit our data.
For each subprocessor, what independent attestation do they hold?
Do any subprocessors further subcontract data processing to additional entities?
Do you have right-to-audit clauses with your subprocessors?
How frequently do you assess or audit your subprocessors?
Have any subprocessors changed in the last 12 months?
Will you notify us before making material changes to subprocessors who handle our data?
